channel.title: The one day ban project
channel.description:
Hi, as a project realising the idiocracy of Jagex and their suprising lack of priority in banning those who really abuse the system over those who drop an f bomb now and then, i have decided to create an experiment to see if it is really possible.
The goal: My goal is to start with my account i made at 11:00 Pm PST on 11/23/07 and get it permanently banned with 10+ black marks by 11:00 Pm 11/24/07 by breaking as many rules as possible.
Rules: -No one I know can help me, by reporting any of my offences and following me around. -I must log out by 11:00 tomarrow. -To be successful I must have 10/10 blackmarks. Added bonus is to be perm muted/48 hour muted.
[img]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/6679/intropicro8.png[/img]
I will be doing this experiment completely in world 17. Feel free to add me and follow my progress.
Progress:
11:49 PM 11/23/07 update:Hello, I'm trying to get some black marks without getting muted right away so I'm saving some of my other stuff until later tonight but I'll be putting up screen shots and videos of what I am doing until the project is over.
http://www.youtube.com/v/ukVYXzCjuLs
[img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/5320/haveuraccountyt0.png[/img] This was only 1 minute in to the real start of the project! Haha XD Some people are morons.
12:12 AM 11/24/07 Someone has done a bunch of work for me! They asked if I was a 'gm' referring to Jagex staff! They now think I'm making them a player mod so everyone else reported me for impersonating staff one giant step!
12:30 AM 11/24/07 Successfully hacked not one but 2 of that guys accounts! Wow he fell right into it... thats i believe 20 black marks? ^_^
12:52 AM 11/24/07 I am giving him back his stuff since he obviously likes the game but is not an awsome player just showing him what could have happened. I'm not that mean.
The haul: [img]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/5203/hack2accountsut1.png[/img]
1:52 AM 11/24/07: After the hacking and staff impersonation I am auto talking and advertising websites!! not to mention i am also swearing :p
10:46 AM 11/24/07: [size=10pt][size=10pt]The project is complete!!! [/size][/size] I had to log out 3 hours into the project but in 3 hours i obtained 20.9 black marks!
[img]http://img142.imageshack.us/img142/2724/permbanandmutekv0.png[/img]
11:19 AM 11/24/07: All of the offences are now appealed! Time to wait for the response!
11:36 AM 11/24/07: The offences have now gone up to 30.9 blackmarks! xD And I havenot been in my account obviously.
[img][/img]

item.title: The one day ban project
item.dc:creator: @lickit lickit
item.description:
@lickit wrote:

so far so good people ^_^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2007, 01:07:52 PM[/size][hr]I HAVE AN IDEA! I’m going to try to appeal a bunch of them XD

Read full topic

item.title: The one day ban project
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

This doesn’t seem like something hard + it seems like a bit of a useless post.
i think i got 80+ something black marks for using “Ron’s auto rule breaker” and that was for only a few minutes standing in world 1 using it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Use Ron’s(I think it’s his) auto rule breaker script…

Read full topic

item.title: The one day ban project
item.dc:creator: @lickit lickit
item.description:
@lickit wrote:

Hi, as a project realising the idiocracy of Jagex and their suprising lack of priority in banning those who really abuse the system over those who drop an f bomb now and then, i have decided to create an experiment to see if it is really possible.

The goal:
My goal is to start with my account i made at 11:00 Pm PST on 11/23/07 and get it permanently banned with 10+ black marks by 11:00 Pm 11/24/07 by breaking as many rules as possible.

Rules:
-No one I know can help me, by reporting any of my offences and following me around.
-I must log out by 11:00 tomarrow.
-To be successful I must have 10/10 blackmarks. Added bonus is to be perm muted/48 hour muted.

I will be doing this experiment completely in world 17. Feel free to add me and follow my progress.

Progress:

11:49 PM 11/23/07
update:Hello, I’m trying to get some black marks without getting muted right away so I’m saving some of my other stuff until later tonight but I’ll be putting up screen shots and videos of what I am doing until the project is over.

http://www.youtube.com/v/ukVYXzCjuLs


This was only 1 minute in to the real start of the project! Haha XD Some people are morons.

12:12 AM 11/24/07
Someone has done a bunch of work for me! They asked if I was a ‘gm’ referring to Jagex staff! They now think I’m making them a player mod so everyone else reported me for impersonating staff one giant step!

12:30 AM 11/24/07
Successfully hacked not one but 2 of that guys accounts! Wow he fell right into it… thats i believe 20 black marks?

12:52 AM 11/24/07
I am giving him back his stuff since he obviously likes the game but is not an awsome player just showing him what could have happened. I’m not that mean.

The haul:

1:52 AM 11/24/07:
After the hacking and staff impersonation I am auto talking and advertising websites!! not to mention i am also swearing

10:46 AM 11/24/07:
[size=10pt][size=10pt]The project is complete!!! [/size][/size]
I had to log out 3 hours into the project but in 3 hours i obtained 20.9 black marks!

11:19 AM 11/24/07:
All of the offences are now appealed! Time to wait for the response!

11:36 AM 11/24/07:
The offences have now gone up to 30.9 blackmarks! xD
And I havenot been in my account obviously.
